Object.id: UNP Servant of the Dark Knight

Object.Description: Using this item gives you 2, 4, 6, 8, or 10 onrane.

EffectInfo.description: This item drops from weekly loyalty packages.

Object.Description: Using this item gives you 100, 200, 300 kantos.

EffectInfo.description: This item drops from weekly loyalty packages.

Object.Description: A premium potion that boost the tier level of the dropped loot.
A premium potion that causes enemies to drop more loot.
A key which opens the entrance to the The Hollows.
A sword made of sapphire gems hidden in a place where no one would find it.
A crystal made from materials from Terradius's ship.
A blade that is sure to stop anything from harming the bearer. Even the sight of this blade will make the opponent flee.
